alert.note: Alert for Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 8:03PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of northeastern Essex, northwestern Addison and southwestern Chittenden Counties through 1000 PM EST... At 800 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was reported south of Lake Champlain, extending from Shelburne to Weybridge. This area of heavy snow is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Snow accumulation 1 to 2 inches per hour. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters in Charlotte reported 1 inch of accumulation in 20 minutes. IMPACT...Rapidly accumulating snow will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Vergennes, South Burlington, Burlington, Middlebury, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Weybridge, Waltham, Kingsland Bay State Park, New Haven, Shelburne, Ferrisburgh, Mt. Philo State Park, Panton, Monkton, Addison, Bridport, Cornwall, Mcneil Cove and Sloop Island.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
